channel.title: blog.lmorchard.com
channel.description: It's all spinning wheels & self-doubt until the first pot of coffee.

item.title: Finley's Overtime
item.description: <html><head></head><body>TL;DR: I'm trying to build a daily creative writing habit. This post is the result of an exercise toward that end. It's probably an awful first draft of a little flash fiction scene, unless I've tried something especially weird or decided to write something meta. Let me know what you think!</body></html>

item.title: Building a New Creative Writing Habit
item.description: <html><head></head><body>TL;DR: I'm trying to build a new creative writing habit. The immediate form that this has taken is a goal of writing 300 words of fiction per day that I post to my blog. I've been using 3-card spreads from a Tarot deck to supply writing prompts. I'm hoping I keep it up.</body></html>
